EmailTemplate.name: PCS Graudation Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: QuickBooks would like to know about your onboarding experience!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Feedback Invitation
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We would like to know about your QuickBooks Payments Onboarding experience!
Take Survey
We invite you to share your overall experience so that we can keep improving our products and services. Please take a moment to complete a brief survey.
We look forward to your feedback.
Thanks for your help, QuickBooks Payments Onboarding Team
